body.name: Belkin BoostCharge Plus 10k mAh Power Bank w/Integrated Lightning Cable & USB-C Cable - iPhone Charger - Battery Pack Portable Charger for iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15, iPhone 14, iPhone 13 - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 11 mins
features: EXTRA LONG BATTERY LIFE: With a capacity of 10,000 mAh, this battery pack provides up to 31 hours** of additional power for an iPhone

COMPACT ALL-IN-ONE DESIGN: With integrated lightning cable & USB-C cable this 10k mAh portable charger is all you need to to keep your favorite devices running all day. Measures just 2.9” x 6.1” x 0.7”, and weighs 0.5 lbs.
CHARGE TWO DEVICES AT ONCE: This power bank can charge two devices at the same time with up to 23W of total output using the integrated iPhone cable and USB Type C cable
PASS THROUGH CHARGING*: Quick charge one device with speeds up to 18W, while the power bank recharges at the same time through the USB-C charger port
LED INDICATOR LIGHT: It’s easy to know when the power bank needs to recharge with the easy to read built in LED indicator light
body.description: The Belkin BoostCharge Plus Portable Charger Power Bank is the perfect way to charge your smartphones and tablets on-the-go. The BoostCharge 10k mAh portable charger features a built-in lightning cable (MFi) and USB-C cable so you can recharge your favorite devices without having to worry about separate cables. The convenience doesn’t stop there, because Belkin BoostCharge Plus also supports pass-through charging*, which allows you to charge both your power bank and connected device at the same time with up to 18W. With a super high capacity of 10,000 mAh, the battery pack can keep your devices charged all day. And you will always know when your power bank needs to be charged, with the onboard LED indicator light quickly and easily displaying the battery status of your portable charger. *Pass-through charging of the portable charger is supported when the power bank is above 25% charge.**Maximum additional video playback hours calculated by comparing the mAh capacity of this power bank with the maximum video playback hours achievable by the iPhone 12 under normal conditions. Actual results will vary depending on differing factors for individual users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact charger for iPhone and iPod
reviews.reviewText: I love how compact this is - lightweight with onboard cords. It’s super easy to charge either my iPhone or iPad. But I almost returned it when it stopped charging my iPhone - until I read the instructions that told me to press the button on the top before plugging it into my iPhone. And it worked! So I love this little device again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Love this charger! It’s super fast, lasts a good long time and has two different plugs so it works with a variety of devices. It’s also very portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Died after 1 year
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in Oct 2022 and now it's Oct 2023. I bought it for when I travel. It was great at the beginning, but it's slowly losing charging power. It used to charge my phone at least twice during a flight. On my last flight it didn't even make it thru one full charge of my phone. I've used it maybe 10 times in the last year. I expected more out of a Belkin product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best universal charger I have owned.
reviews.reviewText: This is worth the purchase. Great charging capacity. Two charging cords make it universal for the family's different phones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No charging cable. Wish it had a numerical display. Doesn’t last as long as I would like.
reviews.reviewText: For the weight, I would have expected more. I had another one from another maker that I lost. I would recommend finding one with a numerical display. It’s way more useful than three dots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Simply amazing battery. Fastest I've used. Charges I phone 15 to full in 20 mins. 3 times.Super easy and comfortable. High quality. Light weight. Highly recommended. I bought 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought two for a two week trip to Japan. Held a charge well and I loved the built in cords so we didn’t have to lug additional cords around. Worked great to keep up battery in a place where we needed our phones constantly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't leave home without it!
reviews.reviewText: This great device quickly charges Apple and Android devices well beyond my expectations! The time it takes to recharge to full power however, will take longer so you you need to watch that.
